Package com.taursys.xml.event

This package contains event related classes for Mapper XML components.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CloseFormListener CloseFormListener is an EventListener interface for CloseFormEvents
InitContextListener InitContextListener is an EventListener interface for InitContextEvents
InitFormListener InitFormListener is an EventListener interface for InitFormEvents
InputListener Interface for listeners for InputEvents
OpenFormListener OpenFormListener is an EventListener interface for OpenFormEvents
ParameterListener Interface for listeners for ParameterEvents
RecycleListener Interface for Listeners for RecycleEvents.
RenderListener Interface for Listeners for RenderEvents.
TriggerListener Interface for listeners for TriggerEvents
 

Class Summary
CloseFormDispatcher CloseFormDispatcher is a Dispatcher for CloseFormEvents
CloseFormEvent CloseFormEvent is an event descriptor for closeForm messages.
Dispatcher Component responsible for receiving and dispatching Events.
InitContextDispatcher InitContextDispatcher is a Dispatcher for InitContextEvents
InitContextEvent InitContextEvent is a message for initializing the context of a component.
InitFormDispatcher InitFormDispatcher is a Dispatcher for InitFormEvents
InitFormEvent InitFormEvent is an event descriptor for initForm messages.
InputDispatcher InputDispatcher is a Dispatcher for InputEvents
InputEvent Event descriptor used when input is received.
OpenFormDispatcher OpenFormDispatcher is a Dispatcher for OpenFormEvents
OpenFormEvent OpenFormEvent is an event descriptor for openForm messages.
ParameterDispatcher ParameterDispatcher is a Dispatcher for ParameterEvents.
ParameterEvent Event descriptor used when parameters are received.
RecycleDispatcher RecycleDispatcher is a subcomponent responsible for receiving and dispatching RecycleEvents.
RecycleEvent RecycleEvent is an event descriptor used for recycle messages.
RenderDispatcher Component responsible for receiving and dispatching RenderEvents.
RenderEvent Event descriptor used for rendering messages
TemplateInputDispatcher TemplateInputDispatcher is a Dispatcher for InputEvents for Templates
TemplateTriggerDispatcher TemplateTriggerDispatcher is Dispatcher of TriggerEvents for Templates
TriggerDispatcher TriggerDispatcher is Dispatcher of TriggerEvents
TriggerEvent Event descriptor used when specific trigger(key/value) is received.
 

Exception Summary
RecycleException General Exception for problems encountered during recycling.
RenderException General Exception for problems encountered in Model objects.
 

Package com.taursys.xml.event Description

This package contains event related classes for Mapper XML components. These events objects are used primarily by web and xml presentation applications.
